create.name: payment
create.body:
[[tags.payment_title]] [[#each paymentInfo]] [[#if this.cardHolderName]]

[[this.cardHolderName]]

[[/if]]

[[this.paymentMethod]] [[#if this.last4]] [[#assign "last4Characters"]][[#size this.last4]][[/size]][[/assign]] [[#eq last4Characters "4"]] **** **** **** [[this.last4]] [[/eq]] [[/if]]
[[#assign "numPayments"]][[#size paymentInfo]][[/size]][[/assign]] [[#neq numPayments "1"]] [[this.amount]] [[/neq]]

[[/each]] [[tags.payment_totalProductsAmountText]] [[totalProductsAmount]] [[tags.payment_deliveryCostText]] [[deliveryCost]] [[#if customizationAdjustment]] [[tags.payment_customizationAdjustmentText]] [[customizationAdjustment]] [[/if]] [[#if shippingDisccount]] [[tags.payment_shippingDisccountText]] [[shippingDisccount]] [[/if]] [[#if totalVatDiscounts]] [[tags.payment_totalVatDiscountsText]] [[totalVatDiscounts]] [[/if]] [[#if employeeDisccounts]] [[tags.payment_employeeDisccountsText]] [[employeeDisccounts]] [[/if]] [[#if disccounts]] [[tags.payment_disccountsText]] [[disccounts]] [[/if]] [[#if subtotal]] [[tags.payment_subtotalText]] [[subtotal]] [[/if]] [[#if salesTax]] [[tags.payment_salesTaxText]] [[salesTax]] [[/if]] [[#eq dutyType "DDP"]] [[tags.payment_totalDutyText]] [[totalDuty]] [[/eq]] [[#if giftCardDiscounts]] [[tags.payment_giftCardDiscountsText]] [[giftCardDiscounts]] [[/if]] [[tags.payment_totalAmountText]] [[totalAmount]] [[#eq dutyType "DAP"]] [[tags.payment_dutyTypeDAPText]] [[else]] [[#eq dutyType "DDP"]] [[else]] [[tags.payment_includeTaxText]] [[/eq]] [[/eq]]
